attributes.action: Each year, every person has to give one of their things away to those in poverty
attributes.additional_details:
It could be anything; the tiniest gift can make a big difference to someone's life; just knowing that there is someone out there who cares for them can make them feel secure and sheltered and give them the confidence to get back onto their own two feet. 
Follow the links below:
http://www.barnardos.org.uk/what_we_do/our_work/child_poverty/child_poverty_case_studies_stories.htm
http://www.huffingtonpost.co.uk/2014/12/08/feeding-britain_n_6287300.html
attributes.background: In the UK, if your family brings in less than £15,000 a year, you are in poverty. There are families out there who are in desperate need of something. By giving at least one possession away per person can make a huge difference to their lives.
